name: Fit'n Punch XR
description:
Are you in search of new real boxing vr games on web?
This is  the   WebXR  Game  for  Everyone,  a  room-scale  or  stand alone  VR  boxing  game.  

Fit'n  Punch XR,  face  off  in  the  virtual   ring  where  you'll  jab  or  uppercut.

This game is a boxing training WebXR for Oculus Quest Browser, a combination of boxing and  actions game. In this game, there are different rounds of different enemies.

Players have to hit combinations as they’re called out and the faster they do it, the higher points they score. If you’re serious about fitness and just want to get in shape, this Game is a best recommendation. 

Free and Fun!

Credit Character: Kenney Character Assets
